de.lessvoid.nifty.node

Class PaddingLayoutNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.node.PaddingLayoutNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiftyNode

    public final class PaddingLayoutNode
extends Object
implements NiftyNode
    The padding layout nodes applies a padding to the inner layout nodes. Each direct inner layout node is subject to the padding applied.

    Each child node will be stretched to the full available size minus the padding. The desired size will be the maximum size requested by the child nodes plus the padding.

    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>
